info.author: Point45
info.description:
Point45 Twisted / Python Utility Package

* Adbapi - a somewhat dbapi compliant adbapi for Twisted.
* Defertrap - analagous to twisted's defgen in that it enables generators to
yield deferreds, resuming them upon callback and synchronously raising
exceptions on errback
info.name: Point45
info.html_description:
Point45 Twisted / Python Utility Package

* Adbapi - a somewhat dbapi compliant adbapi for Twisted.
* Defertrap - analagous to twisted's defgen in that it enables generators to
yield deferreds, resuming them upon callback and synchronously raising
exceptions on errback
